subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. allowed Miami’s Dwyane Wade to play in Game 3 here after issuing him a retroactive flagrant foul-1 penalty on Sunday for his elbow in Game 2.
snippet: The N.B.A. allowed Miami’s Dwyane Wade to play in Game 3 here after issuing him a retroactive flagrant foul-1 penalty on Sunday for his elbow in Game 2.
